Module.Name: Single value concentrations
Module.Description: Single value concentrations data are the single value estimates (High Residue, Maximum Residue Limit, Supervised Trials Median Residue) of residue concentrations on modelled foods.
Module.ShortDescription: Single value concentrations data are the single estimates (HR, MRL, STMR) of residue concentrations on modelled foods.
Module.CalculationDescription: Single value concentrations are calculated as a percentile (p50, p97.5 or maximum residue limit) of the modelled food concentration distribution.
Module.DataDescription: Single value concentrations data are the single value concentrations of residues on modelled foods.
